parameters.query: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(last_synced_bug_id), 0) AS max_synced_bug_id FROM mantis.sync_log WHERE sync_status = 'SUCCESS' AND sync_type = 'INCREMENTAL';
INSERT INTO mantis.sync_log (sync_type, sync_status, start_time) VALUES ('INCREMENTAL', 'RUNNING', NOW()) RETURNING id as sync_log_id;

WITH target_bugs AS (
  SELECT id, {{ $json.offset || 0 }} AS query_offset
  FROM mantis_bug_table
  WHERE status = 85
    AND id > {{ $json.max_synced_bug_id || 0 }}
  ORDER BY id
  LIMIT 500 OFFSET {{ $json.offset || 0 }}
),
latest_history AS (
  SELECT
    bug_id,
    field_name,
    new_value,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY bug_id, field_name ORDER BY date_modified DESC, id DESC) AS rn
  FROM mantis_bug_history_table
  WHERE bug_id IN (SELECT id FROM target_bugs)
    AND field_name IN (
      'ç¢ºèªè€…(ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ)', 'ç¢ºèªæ—¥(ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ)',
      'èª¿æŸ»è€…', 'èª¿æŸ»æ—¥',
      'ä¿®æ­£è€…', 'ä¿®æ­£æ—¥',
      'ãƒã‚°åˆ†é¡', 'ãƒã‚°åŒºåˆ†', 'é–¢é€£ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰',
      'åŸå› åŒºåˆ†(å¤§)', 'åŸå› åŒºåˆ†(å°)',
      'éšœå®³ç™ºç”ŸåŸå› ', 'ä¿®æ­£å†…å®¹'
    )
),
history_pivot AS (
  SELECT
    bug_id,
    MAX(CASE WHEN field_name = 'ç¢ºèªè€…(ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ)' THEN new_value END) AS test_confirmer_name,
    MAX(CASE WHEN field_name = 'ç¢ºèªæ—¥(ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ)' THEN new_value END) AS test_confirmed_ts,
    MAX(CASE WHEN field_name = 'èª¿æŸ»è€…' THEN new_value END) AS investigator,
    MAX(CASE WHEN field_name = 'èª¿æŸ»æ—¥' THEN new_value END) AS investigated_ts,
    MAX(CASE WHEN field_name = 'ä¿®æ­£è€…' THEN new_value END) AS fixer,
    MAX(CASE WHEN field_name = 'ä¿®æ­£æ—¥' THEN new_value END) AS fixed_ts,
    MAX(CASE WHEN field_name = 'ãƒã‚°åˆ†é¡' THEN new_value END) AS bug_category_jp,
    MAX(CASE WHEN field_name = 'ãƒã‚°åŒºåˆ†' THEN new_value END) AS bug_classification,
    MAX(CASE WHEN field_name = 'é–¢é€£ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰' THEN new_value END) AS related_command,
    MAX(CASE WHEN field_name = 'åŸå› åŒºåˆ†(å¤§)' THEN new_value END) AS cause_large,
    MAX(CASE WHEN field_name = 'åŸå› åŒºåˆ†(å°)' THEN new_value END) AS cause_small,
    MAX(CASE WHEN field_name = 'éšœå®³ç™ºç”ŸåŸå› ' THEN new_value END) AS root_cause_text,
    MAX(CASE WHEN field_name = 'ä¿®æ­£å†…å®¹' THEN new_value END) AS fix_detail_text
  FROM latest_history
  WHERE rn = 1
  GROUP BY bug_id
)
SELECT
  b.id AS bug_id,
  LPAD(CAST(b.id AS CHAR), 7, '0') AS bug_no_for_ui,
  p.name AS project_name,
  CASE b.view_state
    WHEN 10 THEN 'å…¬é–‹'
    WHEN 50 THEN 'éå…¬é–‹'
    ELSE CONCAT('view_state_', b.view_state)
  END AS view_state_name,
  FROM_UNIXTIME(b.date_submitted) AS registered_at,
  FROM_UNIXTIME(b.last_updated) AS last_updated_at,
  CONCAT_WS('_', hu.username, hu.realname) AS handler_display,
  CONCAT_WS('_', ru.username, ru.realname) AS reporter_display,
  CASE b.status
    WHEN 10 THEN 'new' WHEN 20 THEN 'feedback' WHEN 30 THEN 'acknowledged' WHEN 40 THEN 'confirmed'
    WHEN 50 THEN 'assigned' WHEN 77 THEN 'èª¿æŸ»ä¸­' WHEN 78 THEN 'ä¿®æ­£ä¸­' WHEN 80 THEN 'resolved'
    WHEN 85 THEN 'ç¢ºèªæ¸ˆ' WHEN 90 THEN 'closed' ELSE CAST(b.status AS CHAR)
  END AS status_name,
  CASE b.priority
    WHEN 10 THEN 'none' WHEN 20 THEN 'low' WHEN 30 THEN 'normal' WHEN 40 THEN 'high'
    WHEN 50 THEN 'urgent' WHEN 60 THEN 'immediate' ELSE CAST(b.priority AS CHAR)
  END AS priority_name,
  CASE b.severity
    WHEN 10 THEN 'feature' WHEN 20 THEN 'trivial' WHEN 30 THEN 'text' WHEN 40 THEN 'tweak'
    WHEN 50 THEN 'minor' WHEN 60 THEN 'major' WHEN 70 THEN 'crash' WHEN 80 THEN 'block'
    ELSE CAST(b.severity AS CHAR)
  END AS severity_name,
  b.reproducibility,
  b.summary,
  bt.description AS detail_description,
  c.name AS category_name,
  hp.investigator,
  FROM_UNIXTIME(CAST(hp.investigated_ts AS UNSIGNED)) AS investigated_at,
  hp.fixer,
  FROM_UNIXTIME(CAST(hp.fixed_ts AS UNSIGNED)) AS fixed_at,
  NULLIF(TRIM(hp.bug_category_jp), '') AS bug_category_jp,
  NULLIF(TRIM(hp.bug_classification), '') AS bug_classification,
  NULLIF(TRIM(hp.related_command), '') AS related_command,
  NULLIF(TRIM(hp.cause_large), '') AS cause_large,
  NULLIF(TRIM(hp.cause_small), '') AS cause_small,
  hp.root_cause_text,
  hp.fix_detail_text,
  tb.query_offset AS current_offset
FROM target_bugs tb
JOIN mantis_bug_table b ON b.id = tb.id
LEFT JOIN mantis_project_table p ON p.id = b.project_id
LEFT JOIN mantis_user_table hu ON hu.id = b.handler_id
LEFT JOIN mantis_user_table ru ON ru.id = b.reporter_id
LEFT JOIN mantis_bug_text_table bt ON bt.id = b.bug_text_id
LEFT JOIN mantis_category_table c ON c.id = b.category_id
LEFT JOIN history_pivot hp ON hp.bug_id = b.id
ORDER BY b.id;

={{ $items('æŸ¥è¯¢å¾…åŒæ­¥æ•°æ®').length > 0 ? 'SELECT bug_id FROM mantis.bug_analysis WHERE bug_id = ANY(ARRAY[' + $items('æŸ¥è¯¢å¾…åŒæ­¥æ•°æ®').map(item => item.json.bug_id).join(',') + ']::INTEGER[]);' : 'SELECT 0 AS bug_id WHERE FALSE;' }}

UPDATE mantis.sync_log 
SET 
  sync_status = 'SUCCESS',
  end_time = NOW(),
  execution_time_seconds = EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - start_time))::INTEGER,
  last_synced_timestamp = NOW(),
  last_synced_bug_id = (SELECT MAX(bug_id) FROM mantis.bug_analysis)
WHERE id = {{ $('åˆ›å»ºåŒæ­¥æ—¥å¿—').first().json.sync_log_id }};

SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_records,
  MAX(last_updated_at) as latest_update,
  MIN(registered_at) as earliest_create
FROM mantis.bug_analysis;
